job_details.Vacaturetitel: Junior Software Developer | €3250 - €3750 bruto per maand
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
AssistYou is looking for a talented, enthusiastic Junior Software Developer to join their team. This is a great opportunity to develop your technical skills. Forget about building webshops; you will be learning how to implement and apply LLM's & other AI-based technologies to create outstanding Digital Hosts for some of the most well-known Dutch and European companies. Focused on voice-based channels (i.e., telephony), you will work with streaming data, real-time processing, AI & Cloud Computing. Read on to discover why this challenge awaits you., * Designing and Coding outstanding Digital Hosts for our Enterprise companies.
     * Working with Customer Engineers to implement connectivity between our platform and their systems.
     * Investigating, evaluating & fine-tuning the performance of our Digital Hosts
     * Helping come-up with and implement improvements to our platform based on customer learnings.
     * Joining sales meetings to consult on technical matters and come-up with the smartest way to achieve a customer's goal using our technology.
job_details.full_text:
Junior Software Developer | €3250 - €3750 bruto per maand

AssistYou is looking for a talented, enthusiastic Junior Software Developer to join their team. This is a great opportunity to develop your technical skills. Forget about building webshops; you will be learning how to implement and apply LLM's & other AI-based technologies to create outstanding Digital Hosts for some of the most well-known Dutch and European companies. Focused on voice-based channels (i.e., telephony), you will work with streaming data, real-time processing, AI & Cloud Computing. Read on to discover why this challenge awaits you., * Designing and Coding outstanding Digital Hosts for our Enterprise companies.
     * Working with Customer Engineers to implement connectivity between our platform and their systems.
     * Investigating, evaluating & fine-tuning the performance of our Digital Hosts
     * Helping come-up with and implement improvements to our platform based on customer learnings.
     * Joining sales meetings to consult on technical matters and come-up with the smartest way to achieve a customer's goal using our technology.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes implementing and applying LLMs and AI-based technologies to create 'Digital Hosts', specifically mentioning fine-tuning performance and working with streaming data. This aligns strongly with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer focused on building user-facing applications powered by generative models.

phrases: implement and apply LLM's & other AI-based technologies
Investigating, evaluating & fine-tuning the performance of our Digital Hosts
job_tasks.justification: These phrases directly relate to working with and adapting generative models (LLMs) and evaluating their performance, which is central to the Modeling task in GenAI.

phrases: Designing and Coding outstanding Digital Hosts for our Enterprise companies
implement connectivity between our platform and their systems
job_tasks.justification: The role involves designing, coding, and implementing features for 'Digital Hosts' and the platform, indicating traditional software development to integrate AI capabilities into user-facing applications.

phrases: working with streaming data, real-time processing
job_tasks.justification: Working with streaming data and real-time processing suggests the need for robust deployment and monitoring infrastructure, which falls under Operations Engineering for AI systems.

phrases: achieve a customer's goal using our technology
job_tasks.justification: The role involves understanding customer goals and consulting on technical solutions, requiring an understanding of business needs and how technology can address them.

soft_skills.phrase: great opportunity to develop your technical skills
come up with the smartest way to achieve a customer's goal
Joining sales meetings to consult on technical matters
Helping come-up with and implement improvements to our platform
